welcome.title: Welcome to the Music Exploration Experiment!
welcome.intro: This experiment evaluates a visualization-based music discovery approach.
welcome.step1: Select a genre and emotion, then click "Analyze"
welcome.step2: Each point represents a song. Nearby points = similar sounding songs
welcome.step3: Different colors indicate different listening experience clusters
welcome.step4: Marked points (C1, C2...) are representative songs of each cluster - start exploring from here
welcome.step5: Click any point to preview a 30-second clip
welcome.step6: Experience versions A and B, and rate each
welcome.taskRequirement: Task requirement: Please explore at least 3 different genre+emotion combinations

transition.title: Stage 2: Free Exploration
transition.intro: Great! You've completed the guided task.
transition.step1: Now, please feel free to select any Genre and Emotion you like.

questionnaire.rateExperience: Rate your experience with this version
questionnaire.preference: Which version helped you discover music better?
questionnaire.feedback: Please explain your choice or describe any issues

completion.title: Thank You!
completion.message: Your responses have been submitted successfully.
completion.downloadPrompt: Please download the data file and send it to

task.guidedInstruction: Follow the axis labels and try to find a path from one end of the map to the other. Notice how the music style changes along the way.
task.freeExploreInstruction: Freely explore the map and find 2-3 songs you like. Click the ❤️ button to mark your favorites.

progress.minRequired: Please listen to at least {min} songs before continuing

newQuestions.genreEmotionMatch: Do the songs in this map generally match the "{genre} + {emotion}" style?
newQuestions.genreEmotionMatchFree: Do the songs in this map generally match the style of the target genre and emotion combination?
newQuestions.discoverability: It was easy to find music that matched my expectations
newQuestions.serendipity: I discovered music I liked unexpectedly
newQuestions.satisfaction: I am satisfied with this exploration experience
newQuestions.transitionNatural: Was the transition from one end to the other natural and smooth?
newQuestions.hasJump: Were there any noticeable jumps or gaps during the transition?
newQuestions.axisUnderstandable: Were the axis labels easy to understand?
newQuestions.axisNavigation: Did the axis labels help you navigate?
newQuestions.clusterDistinct: Did the ★ representative songs of different color clusters sound distinctly different?
newQuestions.easierToFind: Which version made it easier to find songs you like?
newQuestions.betterAxisLabels: Which version had more accurate axis labels?
newQuestions.betterLayout: Which version's layout better matched your listening perception?
newQuestions.overallPreference: Overall, which version do you prefer?

ui.insufficientSongs: Not enough songs in this combination. Please try another.
